name: Hang Pilot
overview:
Hang Pilot is an hangliding racing game developed and published by Konami and released on Arcade on February 1997

The game is an hangliding simulation racing game and features three pilots that can be choosen from and three stages. Each of them represents a level of difficulty; Beginner, Medium and Expert. The player runs against three others opponents and the goal is to finish in first place. Each track have a time limited, but passing through checkpoints will extend the time.
